title: I play and rest!
content:
Children have the right to play, rest and engage in recreational activities appropriate to their age.
 
Children may not be exploited by anyone to make money or to do dangerous work. If children work, their working conditions and schedules should be appropriate to their age as specified by all federal, state and local laws and regulations, should not jeopardize their health or safety and should provide a reasonable wage.
